title: The purposes as may be notified by the Government from time to time, by way of, modification to, new addition of, any of the provisions of sanctioned Development Control & Promotion Regulations
clause_text: The purposes as may be notified by the Government from time to time, by way of, modification to, new addition of, any of the provisions of sanctioned Development Control & Promotion Regulations.
section: CASES ELIGIBLE FOR TRANSFERABLE DEVELOPMENT RIGHTS (TDR):-
